comment: simple assignments, follow rubric. very undertstanding, replies quickly. would rec her if you want a class that is simple while very knowledgeable. a few assignments a week, follow rubrics and do work youll get an A
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Her online course was amazing! It is a good amount of work but it is an online course and everything is doable as small amounts are given weekly. Her grading is super clear. ALWAYS look at the rubrics as she goes by the rubric.
This is a very simple and straight forward class. Some weeks have more assignments than others. It may seem like a lot, but it is all very simple and an easy A
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Online Savvy

comment: The workload is reasonable and relatively easy. As long as you do the work you should get an A. My only complaint is that the material is super biased and liberal, but she respects oppositional opinions. You can speak your mind and still do well.

Can not recommend Dr. Gimenez and this class enough! As long as you complete the modules on time (which can be easily done) and really show that you care about the subject, you can get a good grade without a problem. Great professor and great class! Brings up a lot of interesting and not-talked about points that make you think.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria

comment: Taken during COVID, Dr. Gimenez's class was fairly simple. 10 Modules, with about 3-4 Readings and 2-3 Assignments each, and Field Experience Assignments. The Field Experience sucked because we didn't gain any actual experience, but that wasn't her fault (dumb COVID), so I don't blame her for that. Easy A if you just do the busy work.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria

comment: I took this class online and instructions were very clear. I was not confused at any point in the semester. Field experience is required, no write up about the field experience. You will learn a lot of valuable information in this class.

She is honestly a wonderful professor and very organized. No texts or quizzes. Just papers, readings, and discussion posts. I learned a lot throughout this course from the busy work but it is so beneficial. She gives wonderful feedback and is great at responding to emails.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Get ready to read

comment: I love taking this class. I took this class online and it was very organized. The assignment were pretty easy, nothing too demanding. No quizzes or final. She is very nice and answers any questions. I would take her again and again !

I enjoyed taking her course. It wasn't hard, but you are required to put thought and hard work into your discussion posts and assignments. Make sure you do the assignments each week because you will have to write a paper about it at the end and a few throughout the course.
I absolutely love her. Do your work and you will pass. The work is not really that difficult and if you get on top of it early, you will succeed. I would take Dr. Gimenez again in a heart beat.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Took this class with Dr. Gimenez over the summer.  She was an effective teacher who gave great feedback.  As long as you read the material and review the rubric for each journal and paper, then you will do well.  The class is not difficult, but the book is a little boring.  Participate and ask questions as needed and you will get a good grade.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: Dr. Gimenez is an excellent professor.  She is fair and provides good feedback.  Reading material is boring, but not heavy.  No tests and one group project.  Weekly discussion and/or journal based on questions she poses.  Be thorough in your responses and use your rubric for a good grade.  Would take again.

Dr. Gimenez was a great professor. She graded things promptly and gave great feedback. Her assignments are actually relevant to the major if your major is education. Don't bother getting any of textbooks you can finesse  your way through the course without it. Easy A *Dab*

Dr. Gimenez is straight-forward and the work you have to do in the class is simple. Just read the assignment outline she gives each week and submit all your work on time. The class took up less than 30 minutes a week on average, and it wasn't hard work either.
